short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gotax – The Ultimate Chrome Extension for CPAs

Gotax helps Certified Public Accountants efficiently manage their clients by automatically scraping analytical data and integrating it directly into their CRM systems. Save time, improve data accuracy, and focus on providing top-notch financial advice with our streamlined automation tools.

Key Features:

Efficient Client Management: Organize and access client information centrally.
Automated Data Scraping: Extract and transfer analytical data seamlessly to your CRM.
Process Automation: Reduce manual tasks and enhance data accuracy.
Increased Productivity: Focus more on financial analysis and client advisory services.
Gotax – Empowering CPAs to manage clients and data with ease and precision.
